title: Has game difficulty spiked recently?
body:
I cant seem to get a win lately - games where I am doing ok I've got potatoes, and other games I'm just getting reamed harder than normal.

I was sitting pretty comfortably at the top of S3 most of the season in yoloQ and in the last week I've plummeted to S5 and I reckon I'll probably go back to bronze.

What has changed? Are more smurfs hitting ranked to make a start on end of season rewards? Am I in the goldilocks MMR zone where players new to ranked get put? Has my hand eye coordination just gone to shit in the last week after 12 months of playing pretty well?

replies.body: haha I'm not sure but I'm kinda afraid to enter ranked because I've been on a long streak where I have been decimated in normals so you're not the only one (though I went from slightly below average, to holy cow I'm terrible). I think it's just cause more of the experienced and dedicated player base has focused on increasing rank recently leading to a surge of more serious players and also I feel I've been tilted for some reason too so that might be part of it for you too.

Okay so I just entered ranked did my promos and got into silver 3 and I'm not falling because I keep getting carried even though I'm bronze, only been playing for 7 months garbage and yeah I feel it's because of people like me that it's harder to climb because of all these new players like me feeding and not being useful in the slightest. I went 0/6/13 in one of my worst games as a janna ever fml I'm garbage. Silver is definitely the goldilocks zone of new only been playing for a few months and barely hit lvl30 garbage in ranked atm.

it is cuz of new year ranked rewards or something, but the amount of smurfs right now has lowered and can again smash others in game~ so gotta start climbing again back to where i belong to high bronze from bronze 5 lelel. tbh right now im a little scared to play although most games im having right now are very easy to win maybe cuz it is b5. i get titled so easily now~ scared to play more than 2 or 3 games per day~ before i could easily play 5-6 games and win at least 4 of it, but now i play like 2 games a day and think what if next game i face smurf and fk me up so lets not test my luck and have a rest from it now
Oh and i had a first time veigar mid on my team in my promos last night.  They went 1/13.

Lemme guess...



There is a Yasuo in every single one of your lost games.
jk
Its rare that i dont ban that cnt.

So i see an annie.  So i sez to myself "lets take xerath and counter that little thing".  So annie rushes boots of mobility and goes 23/3. Annie was smart. 
I'm no plat but i know a smurf when i see one.

i planned to get out  from bronze~ kept winning and had 10 win streak then one day all of the sudden started to face good players that should not be there and lost like 30 matches ~ got into to a tilt~ fkfkfkfkfk dropped down so deep to bronze 5. i just gave up now~ fk my lyf im deep in sh it. I lost with 28 kills and 8 deaths~ like how~ and it kept happening to me. other lanes were like wtf is going on~ they couldnt even farm while facing smurfs~ yasuo main in my team had like 30 ish cs in 15 mins while enemy riven had like 150ish~ he kept destroying him~ cruel mouthAFKers.

how most of my ranked games go.... group of solos vs a group of premades(4-5 same club) or if its not that you getting stomped by an experienced smurf or booster. normall mmr matched with bronzes to plats who have a decent skill level so the games are most of the time even, play ranked its a bunch of solo spuds getting stomped. why doesn't this happen in normals because not every role gets fucking counterpicked leading to every lane getting fucking stomped,why are comebacks a regular thing in normals? because people tend to not give up 5 minutes in and start a negative fuckfest blamegame.

im fucking done with ranked and spending money on this game until they adress how unfair this ranking system has become. thats ok the more people get boosted by any method, the lower skill level will just start creeping up the ladder and the more genuine players who actually earned there rank will get fed up and quit leaving game quality in a dismal state. 

ranked is in the toilet, i dont care if i stay bronze/unranked for ever.
A lot of unranked people are deciding to do their placements now because it's almost the end of the season, and yes this is the time where the smurfs and boosters come out
